name: Hover (itch)
description:
What is Hover?

Hover is a physics based crate delivery game without a goal. It's got a nice feel to hover cart which is why I didn't add a motive; I want you to enjoy playing around with it.

Post Development Comments

Physics Engine; that was the theme for the fourth Game A Week. It found a really basic hover tutorial in the Unity docs and expanded from there. I was really happy with the result  too, it's got a nice scope for a week and works as intended.

I don't have much else to say about this one, it was nice to make and had a surprisingly smooth development process. Sure the randomly spawning ramps are clunky but that's just being too finicky for something I would probably take out if I were to work on it more. 

Where To From Here

I learnt all about procedural generation in game a week number five (see camera), so think adding that in would be really fun.
